name: Lost Surreal Hell
description:
A Surreal Horror Game Inspired By Reoccurring Dreams.


Lost Surreal Hell is a Turn Based RPG, where you collect elements, and evolve your attacks, BUT if you wander too far off the path, you may end up stuck in a strange surreal hell full of aesthetic clashing, disjointed worlds full of surreal comedy shows, brainwashing, a strange company running a dying MMO in the backrooms and a dark truth.

A game world left to rot.


Follow the journey of the main character as they "mysteriously appear" in a colourful, dream-like world.
It is clear that there is something wrong with this world however, only you can unravel the truth.




Combat can take a while to learn and has difficult survival horror resource management elements to it.

Every fight in this game is winnable, no matter how impossible some of them may seem.

There are no luck based misses in this game, if the opponent wants to dodge a bullet, they must have a higher speed stat than the speed of sound, otherwise it will hit them 100% of the time.

Each element has it's own evolution tree, attack evolutions can be purchased from the evolution menu, and you can only equip 6 attacks at a time from your list allowing for many different options and playing styles.
